# References {#sec-references .unnumbered}

::: {.callout-note}
## Bibliography

This section will be automatically populated with references cited throughout the handbook when using Quarto's citation system.
:::

::: {.callout-tip}
## Using Citations in Quarto

To add citations to your documents:

1. Create a `.bib` file with your references
2. Add `bibliography: references.bib` to your `_quarto.yml` or document YAML header
3. Cite works using `[@citation-key]` syntax
4. References will automatically appear in this section
:::
